pullRequest.title: Rework the code with Thread.interrupt()
pullRequest.bodyText:
The change is to remove the previous code
in suspendThread() plus a few modifications
in Thread to support Thread.interrupt().
Signed-off-by: Cheng Jin jincheng@ca.ibm.com

nodes.bodyText: Please indent this line properly with this change.
I don't think this does anything - since you already own the lock, calling isAlive is identical to this code, which might make this solution incorrect.

nodes.bodyText: We don't use static variables for this, there is a structure, however you can use the macro J9VMJAVALANGTHREAD_DEADINTERRUPT rather than using JNI, so the global ref/field id isn't required anyway.
This also needs to occur when J9VMJAVALANGTHREAD_STARTED is false.
This also needs to occur when J9VMJAVALANGTHREAD_STARTED is false.

nodes.bodyText: If && is used here, the code below doesn't need to be duplicated.
#if JAVA_SPEC_VERSION >= 14 can be used instead of a runtime check.
